title: Frank Harris III: A Trump Travel Ban That Might Just Work
text: Our health as a nation will be better without the daily stress from the mess he creates and perpetuates during the reality show that is the Trump administration. It is a 24-hour, seven-days-a-week, unscripted, live reality show starring Donald Trump as president. Each day brings a new plot tweet and revelation that feeds the cable news networks' hosts and panelists, followed by another Sean Spicer press conference and more tweets capped off by the late-night comics led by Stephen Colbert speaking truth to power through comedy.
summary:
Our health as a nation will be better without the daily stress from the mess he creates and perpetuates during the reality show that is the Trump administration.
It is a 24-hour, seven-days-a-week, unscripted, live reality show starring Donald Trump as president.
Each day brings a new plot tweet and revelation that feeds the cable news networks' hosts and panelists, followed by another Sean Spicer press conference and more tweets capped off by the late-night comics led by Stephen Colbert speaking truth to power through comedy.
